# About R/Rstudio

## R programming language

<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/1b/R_logo.svg" height="50px" />

  * Implementation of S programming language
  * Publicly available in 1992
  * Created by Ross Ihaka and Robert Gentleman at the University of Auckland
  * R is open source and freely available at [http://cran.r-project.org](http://cran.r-project.org/) under the GNU General Public License (GPL)

<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/93/GPLv3_Logo.svg" width="200px" />

## Rstudio 

<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/f/f0/RStudio_logo.png/1920px-RStudio_logo.png" height="50px" />

  * Integrated development environment (IDE) for R
  * Publicly available in February 2011
  * Two versions: Desktop and Server
  * Rstudio is open source and freely available at [http://www.rstudio.com](http://www.rstudio.com) for Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X and Linux under the GNU Affero General Public License (Affero GPL)

<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/06/AGPLv3_Logo.svg" width="200px" />
